overview: After a hundred years of love, Wang Xueqin (Zhang Yaxi), who died in the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China, was resurrected through the psychic jade after a hundred years of inferiority. The innocence of the nervous big Zhang Xiao Orange (Wu Tong ornaments) slowly The melting of Wang Xueqin, an inexplicable sentiment poured into my heart... It turned out to be contrary to the wish. The appearance of Dajinlong cut off two people. In order to save Zhang Xiaoli, Wang Xueqin raised the spirit of jade.

production_companies.name: Shenzhen Yuemu Taidong Film Media Co., Ltd.

title: Zombie Beauty
